byline.contributor: Mike McIntire reported from Torrance, and Steve Eder from New York. Noah Smith contributed reporting from Torrance.
byline.original: By MIKE McINTIRE and STEVE EDER

abstract: Bill Clinton's brother Roger Clinton, who poses risk of familiar media-related headaches, is once again attracting attention as Hillary Rodham Clinton makes a second run for presidency.
lead_paragraph: Nearly 15 years after the Clinton presidency, Roger Clinton is keeping a lower profile, but questions about using his influence continue to follow him.

headline.main: Roger Clinton Is Wary, Chatty and Still Occasionally Attracting Attention
headline.print_headline: Clinton ‘First Brother’ Is Wary, Chatty and Still Occasionally Attracting Attention

snippet: Nearly 15 years after the Clinton presidency, Roger Clinton is keeping a lower profile, but questions about using his influence continue to follow him.
